description:
Season: 19
Original Air Date: 7/25/2006

Just before the funeral, Thorne has his last moment with Darla at her casket.  Phoebe and Hector discuss how to convince Taylor not to confess, and then try to talk her out of attending the funeral. Nick finds Donna in Brooke’s closet in lingerie; she claims she came to borrow a shirt. At the funeral, Stephanie has a strange feeling about Taylor. Thorne comes over to talk with Taylor, but her guilt is taken over by her sympathy for him. People take turns speaking at the service; Taylor gives a speech as well. Thorne approaches her later and asks Taylor to help him explain to his daughter that Darla is dead.
